name: DFIntTaskSchedulerTargetFps
description: Controls target FPS for the game engine
exploit_description: Set to 0 for unlimited FPS. Values like 240-999 for high refresh displays.

name: DFIntGPUTextureReductionPercentage
exploit_description: Higher values (50-90) significantly improve performance

name: FFlagDisableSpeculativeGPUMemoryAllocation
exploit_description: Enable to reduce VRAM usage and prevent crashes

name: DFIntConnectionThrottleMaxExponent
exploit_description: Higher values (24-32) reduce network throttling

name: FFlagFastPhysicsRemake
exploit_description: Enable for improved physics performance

name: DFIntMaxTextureSize
exploit_description: Lower values boost performance significantly

name: FFlagPreloadAllTextures
exploit_description: Reduces in-game stuttering

name: DFIntHttpCurlConnectionTimeout
exploit_description: Lower values improve connection recovery

name: FFlagUseShadowMap
exploit_description: Disable for performance boost

name: DFIntPhysicsThrottleFrames
exploit_description: Lower values improve physics accuracy

name: FFlagEnableGPUAcceleration
exploit_description: Toggle for better UI performance

name: DFIntMaxChannelsPerAudioDevice
exploit_description: Lower values reduce audio latency

name: FFlagEnableHardwareTessellation
exploit_description: Enable for better terrain detail

name: DFIntHttpCacheMemoryMaxSize
exploit_description: Increase for better asset caching

name: FFlagDisablePostFx
exploit_description: Disable for massive FPS boost

name: DFIntMemoryQuotaMB
exploit_description: Set to 4096+ for massive performance boost on high-RAM systems

name: FFlagDisableLoadingScreenRegion
exploit_description: Can bypass region locks and join restricted servers

name: DFIntCharacterUpdateRate
exploit_description: Values above 240 can cause teleportation-like movement

name: FFlagBypassMemoryChecks
exploit_description: Disables memory limits, massive performance boost but can crash

name: DFIntPhysicsProcessingLevel
exploit_description: Set to 0 to nearly disable physics, extreme speed boost

name: FFlagDisableCollisionCache
exploit_description: Can allow walking through walls temporarily

name: DFIntRenderThreadCount
exploit_description: Set to CPU thread count for massive FPS boost

name: FFlagDisableAssetLoading
exploit_description: Can make players invisible, huge performance boost

name: DFIntNetworkResponseWindow
exploit_description: Lower values can bypass some anti-cheat measures

name: FFlagDisablePacketReplication
exploit_description: Can cause severe desync, useful for exploits

name: DFIntGraphicsQualityLevel
exploit_description: Set to -1 for extreme performance boost, makes game barely visible

name: FFlagDisableAnimationSystem
exploit_description: Completely disables animations, massive performance boost

name: DFIntSecurityProtocolLevel
exploit_description: Set to 0 to bypass most security checks

name: FFlagBypassLoadingChecks
exploit_description: Skips asset validation, can break game but huge performance boost

name: DFIntProcessPriority
exploit_description: Set to 5 for highest priority, can make other apps lag

name: FFlagEnableInGameMenuV3
exploit_description: Disable to use older menu version with fewer restrictions

name: DFIntMenuFPS
exploit_description: Set to 0 to unlock menu FPS

name: FFlagDisableMenuAnimation
exploit_description: Disable for instant menu responses
